knimeNode.name: Binary Objects to Files (Labs)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Write the binary objects of a table as files.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes files from a table with binary objects. It will append the URIs of the files to the output table.
fullDescription.option:
From column
The names can be found in a column of the input table.
Generate
The names will be generated using a pattern.
URI column with the target path.
The directory where the files will be put.
The pattern that will be used to generate the filenames. The ? will be replaced by the index of the corresponding row. (Starting with 0)
Removes the column with the binary objects from the output table.

Specifies the behavior if one of the files already exists.
Overwrite
Overwrite the existing file.
Abort
The nodes execution will be aborted.

ports.inPort: Table that contains the binary objects that will be written. Target paths for the output files can also be used, if they are available in the table.
ports.outPort: Input table with the URI to each file. The URI will only be appended if it is not already present in the table.
